name: flask-starter
description: 1. First set up your virtualenv 2. Run pip install -r requirements.txt to get all packages. 3. To run tests, execute: nose --rednose -- see http://www.realpython.com/blog/python/python-web-applications-with-flask-part-iii/#.U6BIto1dU5E for more info on the tests.
author: Chiedo John
